APP.NAME: avtorevolucija
ABOUT_US.TITLE: Transparency. Trust. Peace of Mind.
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION: At AVTO REVOLUCIJA, transparency and fairness are not just values—they are the foundation of our business. We follow global automotive standards that prioritize honesty, clarity, and customer trust, and we put these principles into practice. Our mission is simple: to provide our customers with confidence and peace of mind at every stage of ownership.
ABOUT_US.SELECTED_VEHICLES_TEXT1: We offer a refined selection of vehicles from the Volkswagen Group, chosen for their quality, reliability, and proven performance.
ABOUT_US.SELECTED_VEHICLES_TEXT2: Each vehicle is thoroughly inspected and prepared to meet high technical standards before being offered for sale.
ABOUT_US.SELECTED_VEHICLES_TEXT3: To ensure a smooth and effortless purchase experience, we also assist with financing and insurance solutions. Upon request, we can arrange vehicle imports from abroad, giving our customers access to a wider range of premium options.
ABOUT_US.COMMITMENT_TITLE: More Than a Sale – A Long-Term Commitment
ABOUT_US.COMMITMENT_TEXT1: We understand that purchasing a used vehicle is only the beginning. The most important moments often come after the purchase, which is why we place exceptional focus on after-sales support.
ABOUT_US.COMMITMENT_TEXT2: Our responsibility does not end when the keys are handed over-we remain your trusted partner long after the purchase.
ABOUT_US.SERVICE_CENTER_TITLE: Dedicated Service Center for Our Customers
ABOUT_US.SERVICE_CENTER_TEXT1: To deliver on this promise, we have established our own service center and showroom, where priority is always given to our customers.
ABOUT_US.SERVICE_CENTER_TEXT2: Our workshop is equipped with advanced diagnostic systems specialized for the Volkswagen Group, enabling precise, manufacturer-focused servicing and expert care. This level of technical capability ensures transparency, accuracy, and long-term vehicle reliability.
ABOUT_US.BENEFITS_SUBTITLE: Every customer who purchases a vehicle with us receives:
ABOUT_US.BENEFIT_1: Free basic diagnostic checks for up to 3 years after purchase
ABOUT_US.BENEFIT_2: A permanent 10% discount on all mechanical services performed by our service center
ABOUT_US.BENEFITS_FOOTNOTE: These benefits are designed to protect your investment and ensure a worry-free ownership experience.
ABOUT_US.LIFELONG_DISCOUNT_TEXT: We believe in long-term relationships with our clients. That's why every customer who purchases a car from us enjoys a lifelong 10% discount on all mechanical services for that vehicle. This is our way of saying thank you for your trust and ensuring your car remains in peak condition for years to come.
ABOUT_US.COMPLETE_EXPERIENCE_TEXT: By combining a premium vehicle selection, transparent business practices, and unmatched after-sales support, we deliver more than just a car - we offer a complete ownership experience built on trust, expertise, and long-term care.
ABOUT_US.TEAM_MEMBER1_DESCRIPTION: With over 20 years of experience, Atanas serves as the lead mechanic, personally overseeing all technical work to ensure precision, reliability, and the highest service standards.
ABOUT_US.TEAM_MEMBER3_DESCRIPTION: Vane founded the business with a clear vision to combine transparent vehicle sales with honest and reliable automotive service.
CAR_DETAIL.WARRANTY_DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive warranty coverage on all mechanical components
CAR_DETAIL.SCHEDULE_TEST_DRIVE_MESSAGE: I'm interested in scheduling a test drive for the {carMake} {carModel} (VIN #{carVIN}). Please contact me to arrange a convenient time.
CAR_DETAIL.REQUEST_INFO_MESSAGE: I'm interested in getting more information about the {carMake} {carModel} (VIN #{carVIN}). Please provide additional details about this vehicle.
CARS.NO_VEHICLES_FOUND_DESCRIPTION: Try adjusting your filters to see more results.
CONTACT_US.MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Tell us how we can help you...
CONTACT_US.COMPANY_NAME_VALUE: AVTO REVOLUCIJA, uvoz, prodaja in servis rabljenih vozil d.o.o.
CONTACT_US.OUR_LOCATION: Our Location: Kajakaška cesta 40, 1211 Ljubljana – Šmartno
CONTACT_US.PARKING: Parking: Free parking available in front of our workshop.
CONTACT_US.PUBLIC_TRANSPORT: Public Transport: Bus stop 5 minutes walk.
CONTACT_US.QUICK_RESPONSE_DESCRIPTION: We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.
CONTACT_US.CUSTOMER_SATISFACTION_DESCRIP: Your satisfaction is our priority. We stand behind our work.
CONTACT_US.THANK_YOU_MESSAGE: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.
CONTACT_US.TAGLINE: Looking for a new vehicle or need a service? Get in touch with us!
FOOTER.ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION: Providing top-notch car services. Your trusted partner for all automotive needs.
HOME.SLIDER2_TEXT: We ensure reliable vehicle maintenance and repairs. With modern diagnostics, expert knowledge, and a personal approach, we deliver high-quality services that build long-term trust and give our customers true peace of mind.
HOME.SLIDER3_TEXT: Trusted by many satisfied customers who value transparency and expert care. Experience the confidence that comes with reliable, professionally delivered service.
HOME.HEADLINE: Your partner for importing, selling, and servicing used vehicles.
HOME.SUBTEXT_1: At AVTO REVOLUCIJA d.o.o., we make sure you find a reliable car at a fair price – with no hidden costs and all the necessary documentation.
HOME.SUBTEXT_2: AVTO REVOLUCIJA d.o.o. is your trusted partner in finding quality used vehicles – fair prices, transparent history, and no surprises.
HOME.MARKETING_FRIENDLY: Find your reliable car with AVTO REVOLUCIJA d.o.o. – fair price, no hidden costs, full documentation
HOME.CAR_SALES_DESCRIPTION: Quality pre-owned vehicles with warranty protection for Volkswagen Group vehicles – Volkswagen, Audi, Škoda, and SEAT.
HOME.MECHANICAL_REPAIRS_DESCRIPTION: Reliable repairs with a personal approach.
HOME.QUICK_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION: Oil changes, brake service, and regular maintenance.
HOME.LIFELONG_DISCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Every car purchased from us comes with lifelong perks, including a permanent 10% discount on all services and free diagnostics.
HOME.CTA_DESCRIPTION: Contact us today to schedule your service or browse our available vehicles.
HOME.REVIEW1_TEXT: Excellent experience! My Volkswagen Golf feels like new after the service. The transparency regarding the work done was exceptional.
HOME.REVIEW2_TEXT: I'm very satisfied with my Škoda purchase. The history was fully documented, and the price was fair. A truly professional team.
HOME.REVIEW3_TEXT: Outstanding service for my Audi. They diagnosed the issue quickly and provided a 10% discount as a returning customer. Highly recommended!
HOME.REVIEW4_TEXT: The best place for Volkswagen Group vehicles. Fast, honest, and reliable service. I've been coming here for years and they never disappoint.
HOME.REVIEW5_TEXT: Professional and transparent. They provided a detailed diagnostic report for my SEAT. No hidden costs, just honest work.
HOME.REVIEW6_TEXT: Imported a vehicle through them and couldn't be happier. They handled all the paperwork and the car is exactly as described. Top notch!
SERVICES.HEADLINE: Professional service and diagnostics for Volkswagen Group vehicles – Volkswagen, Audi, Škoda, and SEAT. In addition, we are equiped with advanced diagnostic systems for other vehicle brands and provide professional servicing for a wide range of vehicles.
SERVICES.DISCOUNT_INFO_LINK: Learn about our Exclusive Customer Benefits for car buyers
SERVICES.EXTENDED_COVERAGE_DESCRIPTION: We stand behind our workmanship by following leading industry standards, ensuring you can trust every repair we perform.
SERVICES.CERTIFIED_TECHNICIANS_WARRANTY_: Our certified mechanics have the expertise to perform repairs that last.
SERVICES.CTA_DESCRIPTION: Contact us today to schedule your service or browse our available vehicles.
